perturbation.original_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby confirm the agreement by and among them to the joint filing on behalf of them of the Statement on Schedule 13D and any and all further amendments thereto, with respect to the securities of the above referenced issuer, and that this Agreement be included as an Exhibit to such filing.
perturbation.changed_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby confirm the agreement by and among them to the joint filing on behalf of them of the Statement on Schedule 13D and any and all further amendments thereto, with respect to the securities of the above referenced issuer. This Agreementâ€™s inclusion as an exhibit to such filing is at the discretion of the filing parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates the inclusion of the agreement as an exhibit. The modified text introduces uncertainty by stating that its inclusion is discretionary, contradicting the initial mandatory statement.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts each of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts, however, the determination of whether each counterpart is deemed an original is subject to review by legal counsel, and their collective status as a single agreement is not guaranteed.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that each counterpart is considered an original and that together they constitute one agreement. The modification introduces doubt about the originality of each counterpart and whether they collectively form a single agreement, thus contradicting the certainty of the original statement.

perturbation.original_text: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned hereby execute this Agreement as of July 6, 2020.
perturbation.changed_text: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned may execute this Agreement; the effective date is subject to confirmation by all parties and may not necessarily be July 6, 2020.
perturbation.explanation: The original text confirms the execution date as July 6, 2020. The modified text introduces uncertainty by stating that execution is not guaranteed and the date might change, contradicting the original fixed date.
